statements: SELECT * FROM class_schedule;
SELECT course_name, instructor, location FROM class_schedule;
SELECT * FROM class_schedule WHERE location = 'Room A';
SELECT course_name, start_time, end_time FROM class_schedule WHERE instructor='John Doe';
SELECT location, course_name, start_time, end_time FROM class_schedule WHERE start_time >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, course_name, instructor, location, start_time, end_time FROM class_schedule;
SELECT course_name, instructor, location FROM class_schedule WHERE start_time >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT course_name, instructor, location, start_time FROM class_schedule WHERE instructor = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM class_schedule WHERE location = 'Room A' ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM class_schedule WHERE end_time <= '2022-12-31' AND location LIKE '%Hall%';
SELECT * FROM class_schedules;
SELECT class_name, class_time FROM class_schedules WHERE instructor_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM class_schedules ORDER BY class_time DESC;
SELECT class_name, location_id FROM class_schedules WHERE class_id = 5;
SELECT instructor_name, department FROM instructors WHERE instructor_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM class_schedules ORDER BY class_id DESC;
SELECT class_name, instructor_name, location_id FROM class_schedules AS c JOIN instructors AS i ON c.instructor_id = i.instructor_id;
SELECT class_name, department, class_time FROM class_schedules AS c JOIN instructors AS i ON c.instructor_id = i.instructor_id WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT class_name, instructor_id, class_time FROM class_schedules WHERE location_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY class_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM class_schedules AS c LEFT JOIN instructors AS i ON c.instructor_id = i.instructor_id WHERE instructor_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM class_schedules WHERE instructor_id = 1;
SELECT class_name, location_id FROM class_schedules WHERE id = 5;
SELECT id, name, email FROM instructors ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE room_number = 101;
SELECT building_name, room_number FROM locations WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM class_schedules WHERE instructor_id = 1 ORDER BY class_name DESC;
SELECT class_name, location_id FROM class_schedules WHERE location_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT instructor_id, COUNT(*) AS class_count FROM class_schedules GROUP BY instructor_id;
SELECT instructors.name, locations.building_name FROM instructors INNER JOIN locations ON instructors.id = locations.id;
SELECT class_name, location_id FROM class_schedules WHERE location_id = 1 OR location_id = 2 ORDER BY class_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM class_schedule;
SELECT id, day, time FROM class_schedule WHERE instructor_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM instructors WHERE id = 3;
SELECT address, capacity FROM locations WHERE id = 2;
SELECT instructor_id, class_id FROM class_instructor;
SELECT * FROM class_schedule WHERE day = 'Monday' AND location_id = 1;
SELECT id, day, time FROM class_schedule WHERE time >= '10:00:00' ORDER BY day ASC;
SELECT instructors.name, instructors.email, locations.address FROM instructors JOIN locations ON instructors.id = locations.id;
SELECT class_id, COUNT(instructor_id) as num_instructors FROM class_instructor GROUP BY class_id HAVING num_instructors > 1;
SELECT * FROM class_schedule WHERE instructor_id IN (SELECT id FROM instructors WHERE name LIKE 'John%') ORDER BY time DESC;
SELECT * FROM class_schedules;
SELECT class_id, class_name, start_time, end_time FROM class_schedules ORDER BY class_name DESC;
SELECT instructor_id, instructor_name, email FROM instructors WHERE instructor_id = 1;
SELECT location_name, city, state FROM locations WHERE zip_code = '10001';
SELECT class_name, start_time, end_time, location_name FROM class_schedules INNER JOIN locations ON class_schedules.location_id = locations.location_id;
SELECT * FROM class_schedules;
SELECT class_name, start_time, end_time FROM class_schedules WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT instructor_name, email FROM instructors WHERE instructor_id = 3;
SELECT location_name, city, state, zip_code FROM locations WHERE zip_code LIKE '90%';
SELECT class_name, instructor_name FROM class_schedules INNER JOIN instructors ON class_schedules.instructor_id = instructors.instructor_id;
